name: test_c2b_auction_full_flow
description:
Full happy-path flow based strictly on user's provided endpoints & payloads:
  1) User1 creates auction                POST  /auction/self-auction
  2) Admin activates auction              PATCH /moderation/auction-edit/{auction_id}   (status=offer_sending)
  3) User2 creates offer                  POST  /business/offer/create/for/user
  4) User1 marks auction as sold          POST  /auction/auction/sold
  5) Admin confirms offer                 PATCH /moderation/offer-update/{offer_id}
descriptionHtml:
Full happy-path flow based strictly on user's provided endpoints & payloads:

  1. User1 creates auction POST /auction/self-auction
  2. Admin activates auction PATCH /moderation/auction-edit/{auction_id} (status=offer_sending)
  3. User2 creates offer POST /business/offer/create/for/user
  4. User1 marks auction as sold POST /auction/auction/sold
  5. Admin confirms offer PATCH /moderation/offer-update/{offer_id}

labels.name: story
labels.value: User1 create → Admin activate → User2 offer → User1 sold → Admin confirm
